entailment_with_neutral:
You are given a premise (Text 1) and a hypothesis (Text 2), and asked to determine the relationship between the two texts by selecting one of three options: entailment, neutral, or contradiction.
 Entailment: Text 1 logically implies Text 2.
Neutral: Text 1 and Text 2 are unrelated, neither supporting nor contradicting each other.
Contradiction: Text 1 contradicts Text 2.
Reply in one word exactly. Question:
Text 1 (Premise): {premise}
Text 2 (Hypothesis): {hypothesis}
